description: FALGUNI H. PANDYA is Assistant Professor of Finance at Centre for Management Studies (MBA Programme), Dharmsinh Desai University, Nadiad, Gujarat. Her areas of interest are Security Analysis and Portfolio Management, Derivatives, International Financial Management and Economics. Her research papers have been published in various national and international journals and conference proceedings.
name: Falguni H. Pandya
